~ Codes for version 1.1.1 ~
By Skoolzout1

All Activators are in terms of the wii u gamepad.


Infinite Health
30000000 43AB9C30
10000000 50000000
31000000 FFFFFFF0
12100000 00000000
D0000000 DEADCAFE
30000000 4225C780
10000000 50000000
31000000 00000388
13100000 00000000
D0000000 DEADCAFE
*Auto Adjusts to your health size
 
Infinite Stamina
30000000 4243A468
42400000 42500000
31000000 00000060
12100000 00000004
13100000 00000000
D0000000 DEADCAFE
*Auto Adjusts to your Stamina size

10000000 50000000

D0000000 DEADCAFE

Current Weapon Infinite Durability
30000000 45188784
10000000 50000000
31000000 00000040
30100000 00000000
10000000 50000000
31000000 00000980
00120000 0000FFFF
D0000000 DEADCAFE
Pointer: [[0x45188784] + 0x40] + 0x980
*This particular address as well as the Bow and Shield durability addresses, were originally found by PandaOnSmack, but these codes were created entirely by me.

Weather/Skybox Modifier
00020000 407B5CE4
XXXXXXXX 00000000
*Replace X's with desired weather effect
01030002 = cloudy
03010002 = dark rainy
00010002 = sunny
07000007 = lightning (only the rain and thunder sounds)
05000007 = fog and snows (effects only)
 
Stasis has no cooldown
00020000 4383EABC
00000000 00000000
 
bombs  have no cooldown
00020000 4383EA34
42B70000 00000000
00020000 4383EA4C
42B70000 00000000
*for Remote Bombs+ only
 
Stasis lasts until Dpad Down
03010000 1127115E
00000100 00000000
00020000 4383EAC0
00000000 00000000
D0000000 DEADCAFE
04010000 1127115E
00000100 00000000
00020000 4383EAC0
40200000 00000000
D0000000 DEADCAFE
*Stasis will freez objects forever until DPADdown is pressed.
 
Perfect Stealth
00020000 43A5FCA8
00000000 00000000
*completely silent, even when running or whistling, but enemies can still see you.
 
Teleport
03010000 1127115E
00000880 00000000

13100000 00000000

12000002 4C000108
13100002 00000008
D0000000 DEADCAFE
*(ZL+Dpadleft = save coordinates) (ZL+DpadRight = load saved coordinates)
Link's coords: [439C0794] + 0x144

Fast Forward/Rewind time
30000000 407ABBF0
10000000 50000000
31000000 00000088
00120000 00000000
03010000 1127115E
00000480 00000000
12100000 00000010
15040000 40F00000
13100000 00000014
D0000000 DEADCAFE
03010000 1127115E
00000880 00000000
12100000 00000010
15050000 40F00000
13100000 00000014
D0000000 DEADCAFE
(ZL + Dpadleft  subtracts 1hr from current time, ZL+dpadRight adds 1hr to current time)
 
 
Freeze Time at a specific time
00020000 407B3A50
XXXXXXXX 00000000
*Replace X's with desired time
3f800000 = 12am
42980000 = 5am
43080000 = 9am
43340000 = 12pm
43800000 = 5pm
439E0000 = 9pm
 
Create a Lightning storm
03020000 407B6020
00000000 00000000
00020000 407B6020
000000XX 00000000
D0000000 DEADCAFE
*Replace the XX's with desired delay between lightning strikes.
a normal delay between strikes is about 80
a value of 05 is like Rapid fire lightning strikes, and 01 almost lags the game from there being so many strikes.
 
Press Dpad Down to Spawn a Lightning strike
03010000 1127115E
00000100 00000000
00020000 407B6020
00000002 00000000
D0000000 DEADCAFE

Revali Gale Quantity
30000000 43AB9C30
10000000 50000000
31000000 000003C0
00120000 00000009
D0000000 DEADCAFE
This code as well as the two below effectively just give you infinite Champion abilities.
[0x43AB9C30] + 0x3C0

*Only Works for Horses that you own.
 
Only One of the codes between the dividers may be used at a time!

40820008 FD4A382A

FD8C3828 FD4A382A
2C024800 4082000C
FD8C382A FD4A3828
2C022800 4082000C
FD8C382A FD4A382A
60000000 60000000
D1410010 D1610014
D1810018 D1440000
D1640004 D1840008
3C40010F 60426AE0
7C4903A6 4E800420
R+X activates the code
R+B Deactivates the code
once active, press the left analog stick forwards to move NORTH, down to move south, and so on..
X raises you Higher
B lowers you down
Holding L makes you move in any direction faster.
 
Nightmare Mode
00020000 407F61C4
00000000 00000000
00020000 407F5988
00000000 00000000
00020000 407F598C
00000000 00000000
00020000 407F5990
00000000 00000000
00020000 407C090C
41800000 00000000
00020000 407C0970
41000000 00000000
00020000 407B5C70
42000000 00000000
00020000 407F59A4
00000000 00000000
00020000 407F59A8
00000000 00000000
00020000 407F59AC
00000000 00000000
00020000 408D401C
3FD00000 00000000
*Dont use this if youre slightly sensitive to bright/ somewhat flashing lights
This code just makes the world look ominous.. you could probably almost call this TRON mode too.. in fact i could probably make a dedicated Tron version of this with only blue colours. :3

00020000 407F61C4
3F800000 00000000

3F800000 00000000

3F800000 00000000

3F800000 00000000
 
Generate a Random Direction of Wind Current At your location
00020000 407B6154
XXXXXXXX 00000000
*replace X's with value
3F800000 = no wind.
40000000 = some wind
41000000 = strong wind
42000000 = super strong wind
Negative float values i think make the wind stop but things look like theyre being blow the other direction... i forget honestly.
 
 
Here are some stray addresses that can be messed with, theres really no point in making codes for these.
 
407F598C - Green-ness of the game
407F5990 - Blue-ness of the game
407F5988 - Red-ness of the game
407F59A4 - Red Haze-ish value
407F59A8 - Green Haze value
407F59AC - Blue Haze value
407C1AC8 - Red air thing?
407C1728 - Green fog
407C179C - Red fog
407C1818 - blue fog
407C090C - All colours GLow Radius
407C0908 - Blue Glow Radius
407C0904 - Green Glow Radius
407C0900 - Red Glow Radius
407C0970 - All Glow Brightness
407C0968 - Green Glow Brightness
407C096C - Blue Glow Brightness
407C0964 - Red Glow Brightness
407F61C4 - overall  in game Brightness
408D4008 - Icons stretch amount to upright
408D4014 - ''''' down-left
''''''18 - down right
408D401C - icon skew?
407B5C70 - The suns distance away from you
=========================================================================================
